name: Fashion Tycoon
description: Lilly was a young dreamy girl working in a fashion boutique. She always dreamed of becoming a successful fashion designer in the fashion capital of the world: Paris. One night something strange happened. A beautiful fairy in a fancy dress appeared. She promised to help Lilly to make her dream come true. All Lilly had to do was travelling to Paris within 45 days and collect people’s inspirations. You can help Lilly to get the inspiration a fashion designer needs. Play this game in 45 levels of pure fashion!
